description: The contracting department has been using the same lab equipment for years and is looking to upgrade to high resolution and dynamic range digital microscopes. They have allocated up to $206,888.00 USD for this project and the contractor needs to submit relevant qualifications and price with response date by 31-Mar-23.
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**

**Title (English/Francais)**: High Resolution, High Dynamic Range Digital Microscope / Microscope numérique haute résolution à plage dynamique élevée

**Reference Number**: PW-22-01009197

**Tender Status**: Expired (Statut de l'appel d'offres : Expiré)

**Publication Date**: October 4, 2022 (Date de publication : 4 octobre 2022)

**Tender Closing Date**: November 14, 2022 at 2:00 PM ADT (Date de clôture de l'appel d'offres : 14 novembre 2022 à 14:00 GDTS)

**RFx ID**: 2023-00429

**Industry Subject Area**: Laboratory Equipment and Supplies (Nível et Équipements de Laboratoire)

**Procurement Category**: Goods (Categorie d’approvisionnement : Marchés)

**Trade Accessions**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (AEC), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (ALECCH), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement

**Regions of Delivery**: Saskatchewan

**Contact Information**

* [Nadege Muhimpundu](mailto:Nadege.Muhimpundu@inspection.gc.ca)
* Canadian Food Inspection Agency
* 1400 Merivale Road
* Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0Y9, Canada

The Canadian Food Inspection Agency invites interested suppliers to submit proposals for the provision of low to medium magnification digital microscope (LMDM) equipment for laboratory and scientific purposes. The RFx document may be accessed from the [Buy and Sell](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/publications) website.  [67 Kb]PDF documents can be reviewed or downloaded directly from [Canada Buys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca).  Please note that all documents are subject to change. However, nobody should miss out on the prominent nature of Canada's purchase agreements among all countries.

The proposed equipment will be used for low to medium magnification analyses (about 10 and 50X magnification) with left-handed Southpaws specifications at the agricultural inspection fields of Canada. No bids will open in persons accepting terms for “ subscript maathe adult couances nights.”  The bidder's ** expands solo**, must obtain aft wide
